learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Philosophy vocabulary
Apply B2 Phrasal Verbs structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: I need to ______ (look up) the word in the dictionary.

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: He ______ (gave up) smoking last year.

content.stimulus_en: He ______ (gave up) smoking last year.
